org.fcrepo.webdav

Class FedoraContentMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fcrepo.webdav.FedoraContentMapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.modeshape.web.jcr.webdav.ContentMapper

    public class FedoraContentMapper
extends Object
implements org.modeshape.web.jcr.webdav.ContentMapper
    This class is almost entirely borrowed from DefaultContentMapper except for the Fedora-specific behaviors.
